TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit IssuerNameRegistry extends System.Object implements class System.IdentityModel.Configuration.ICustomIdentityConfiguration
Public MustInherit Class IssuerNameRegistry Implements ICustomIdentityConfiguration

summary.span: 发布者名称注册表的抽象基类。

span.span: The abstract base class for an issuer name registry.

summary.span: 发行人名称注册表用于加密材料的关联助记名称，需要验证由相应发行人生成的标志签名。

span.span: An issuer name registry is used to associate a mnemonic name to the cryptographic material that is needed to verify the signatures of tokens produced by the corresponding issuer.

summary.span: 颁布者名称注册表维护了一个受依赖一方 （RP） 应用程序信赖的颁布者列表。

span.span: The issuer name registry maintains a list of issuers that are trusted by a relying party (RP) application.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 颁发者名称注册表用于将助记键名称关联到所需的加密材料，以验证相应颁发者生成的令牌签名。The issuer name registry is used to associate a mnemonic name to the cryptographic material needed to verify signatures of tokens produced by the corresponding issuer. 然后，将使用此名称来设置声明的 或 属性。This name is then used to set the or the property of a claim. 由正在处理令牌的安全令牌处理程序从管道中调用由 类公开的方法。The methods exposed by the class are called from the pipeline by the security token handler that is processing the token. 由未被颁发者名称注册表映射的材料签署的令牌将被丢弃为不受信任。Tokens signed by material that is not mapped by an issuer name registry are discarded as untrusted. 颁发者名称注册表返回的名称在 RP 应用程序的上下文中应该是唯一的。The name returned by the issuer name registry should be unique within the context of an RP application. 在代码中，可以通过设置 "" 属性指定要使用的颁发者名称注册表。In code, you can specify the issuer name registry to use by setting the property. 在配置文件中，可以通过在[<securityTokenHandlerConfiguration>](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/windows-identity-foundation/securitytokenhandlerconfiguration.md)元素下指定[<issuerNameRegistry>](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/windows-identity-foundation/issuernameregistry.md)元素来指定颁发者名称注册表。In a configuration file, the issuer name registry can be specified by specifying the [<issuerNameRegistry>](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/windows-identity-foundation/issuernameregistry.md) element under the [<securityTokenHandlerConfiguration>](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/windows-identity-foundation/securitytokenhandlerconfiguration.md) element. Windows Identity Foundation （WIF）提供了一个现成的 类： 类的实现。Windows Identity Foundation (WIF) provides an implementation of the class out of the box: the class. 使用此实现时，可以在[<s>](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/windows-identity-foundation/trustedissuers.md)元素下的 RP 应用程序的配置文件中指定受信任的颁发者列表，该元素是 `` 元素的子元素，在该元素的 `type` 属性中引用 该元素时。When you use this implementation you can specify the list of trusted issuers in the configuration file of the RP application under the [<trustedIssuers>](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/windows-identity-foundation/trustedissuers.md) element, which is a child element of the `` element when the .class is referenced in that element's `type` attribute. 在 `` 元素下，每个颁发者名称将映射到应用于验证其签名的 x.509 证书。Under the `` element, each issuer name is mapped to the X.509 certificate that should be used to verify its signature. 若要创建自定义颁发者名称注册表，必须重写 方法。To create a custom issuer name registry, you must override the method. 此方法返回指定安全令牌的颁发者名称。This method returns the issuer name for the specified security token. 如果要为不同于 的 Windows 令牌提供颁发者名称，则可以选择重写 方法，以便在检索颁发者名称和 方法时提供提示机制。You can optionally override the method to provide a hinting mechanism when retrieving issuer names and the method if you want to provide an issuer name for Windows tokens that is different from . 重写 方法，以使颁发者名称注册表可以从配置文件中进行初始化。Override the method to enable your issuer name registry to be initialized from a configuration file. ## Examples 下面的代码演示 类的一个实现，该实现仅接受使用主题 "CN = localhost" 的证书的颁发者。The following code shows an implementation of the class that only accepts issuers that use certificates with subject "CN=localhost". > [!WARNING] > 下面的代码仅用于说明目的。The following code is for illustrative purposes only. 验证基于使用者名称的证书不是一种好的做法。Validating certificates based on subject name is not a good practice. 不应在生产中使用此代码。This code should not be used as is in production. [!code-csharp[WifIssuerNameRegistry#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Misc/wifissuernameregistry/cs/mvcwepapp/trustedissuernameregistry.cs#1)] 下面显示了使用可信颁发者名称注册表配置应用程序所需的 XML。The following shows the XML necessary to configure an application with the trusted issuer name registry. ```xml ```

span.span: <issuerNameRegistry>

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

summary.span: 当在派生类中重写时，返回指定安全令牌的颁发者名称。

span.span: When overridden in a derived class, returns the issuer name for the specified security token.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 由正在处理令牌的安全令牌处理程序从处理管道中调用。Called from the processing pipeline by the security token handler that is processing the token. 方法应在 RP 应用程序的上下文中返回颁发者的唯一名称。The method should return a unique name for the issuer within the context of the RP application.

MemberSignature.Value: public abstract string GetIssuerName (System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityToken securityToken);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance string GetIssuerName(class System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityToken securityToken) cil managed
public: abstract System::String ^ GetIssuerName(System::IdentityModel::Tokens::SecurityToken ^ securityToken);
abstract member GetIssuerName : System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityToken -> string

param.name: securityToken
param.span: 返回颁布者名称的安全令牌。

span.span: The security token for which to return the issuer name.

summary.span: 当在派生类中重写时，返回指定安全令牌的颁发者名称。

span.span: When overridden in a derived class, returns the name of the issuer of the specified security token.
The issuer name.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 实现应返回一个非 null 和非空字符串来标识已识别的颁发者，或返回一个 null 字符串来标识无法识别的颁发者。Implementations should return a non-null and non-empty string to identify a recognized issuer, or a null string to identify an unrecognized issuer. 由正在处理令牌的安全令牌处理程序从处理管道中调用。Called from the processing pipeline by the security token handler that is processing the token. 方法应在 RP 应用程序的上下文中返回颁发者的唯一名称。The method should return a unique name for the issuer within the context of the RP application. ## Examples 下面的代码演示颁发者名称注册表的 方法。The following code shows the method for an issuer name registry. 完整示例位于 类概述主题中。The full sample is in the class overview topic. > [!WARNING] > 下面的代码仅用于说明目的。The following code is for illustrative purposes only. 验证基于使用者名称的证书不是一种好的做法。Validating certificates based on subject name is not a good practice. 不应在生产中使用此代码。This code should not be used as is in production. [!code-csharp[WifIssuerNameRegistry#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Misc/wifissuernameregistry/cs/mvcwepapp/trustedissuernameregistry.cs#2)]

param.span: 返回颁布者名称的安全令牌。

summary.span: 当在派生类中重写时，返回指定安全令牌的颁发者名称。

span.span: When overridden in a derived class, returns the name of the issuer of the specified security token.

summary.span: 在确定要返回的颁布者名称中要考虑的指定的颁布者名称。

span.span: The specified issuer name may be considered in determining the issuer name to return.
The issuer name.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 默认实现将忽略 `requestedIssuerName` 参数并只调用 方法。The default implementation ignores the `requestedIssuerName` parameter and simply calls the method. 由正在处理令牌的安全令牌处理程序从处理管道中调用。Called from the processing pipeline by the security token handler that is processing the token. 方法应在 RP 应用程序的上下文中返回颁发者的唯一名称。The method should return a unique name for the issuer within the context of the RP application.

span.span: The configuration XML elements.

summary.span: 在派生类中重写时，将从 XML 中加载自定义配置。

span.span: When overridden in a derived class, loads custom configuration from XML.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法由配置基础结构调用。The method is called by the configuration infrastructure. 调用此方法时，`nodelist` 将包含配置文件中[<issuerNameRegistry>](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/windows-identity-foundation/issuernameregistry.md)元素的顶级子元素。When this method is called, the `nodelist` will contain the top-level child elements of the [<issuerNameRegistry>](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/windows-identity-foundation/issuernameregistry.md) element from the configuration file. 其中每个反过来可能包含特性或子元素，具体取决于为派生类定义的配置架构。Each of these may, in turn, contain attributes or child elements depending on the configuration schema you define for your derived class. 默认实现引发 。The default implementation throws a . 在派生类中重写此方法可以从配置文件中初始化颁发者名称注册表。Override this method in your derived class to enable initialization of your issuer name registry from a configuration file.

span.span: <issuerNameRegistry>
